name: Snowball Shootout
description:
Snowball Shootout is an arcade shooting game, in where you shoot snow and try to get the highest score as possible.

This is my first game of 2019! And as the release of Snowball Shootout, it will mark one year since joining The Daily Click!

So, I hope you enjoy Snowball Shootout and I hope you look forward to my future games! And don't forget to comment or review Snowball Shootout if you want, but anyways enjoy and have a good day!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Destroy Snow and Click Buttons

Space Bar: Pause

Mouse: Move Around The Mouse
